product_name: Oregon's Best Wildflower Hikes: Southwest Region
long_description: Artfully designed and authoritatively written, Oregon's Best Wildflower Hikes: Southwest Regions presents 50 dayhikes for prime wildflower viewing. Author: Elizabeth L. Horn. Softcover, 248 pages, color photos and maps. Wildflower guide includes 150 color photographs of plant species and locales, plus 51 handy maps and 52 in-depth wildflower profiles. Hikes are organized by region, difficulty and elevation; includes distance, bloom seasonality and peak times, directions and GPS coordinates. Provides scientific and common names for more than 500 plant species; appendices for public agency information and selected references. Westcliffe Publishers; copyright 2006.
short_description: Artfully designed and authoritatively written, Oregon's Best Wildflower Hikes: Southwest Regions presents 50 dayhikes for prime wildflower viewing.
